attributes.action: To keep the £20 a week for universal credit not to take it away
attributes.additional_details: To help people who are struggling at the moment on benefits. And to take away £20 a week or £80 is going to effect them more. Especially as energy prices are going up
attributes.background: Not to cut £20 a week as people on benefits struggle as it is. £80 a month is a lot of money to be taken away from people, of whom are on benefits
